author: qu0b
content:
So current status:

besu and nethermind are doing well against evm-fuzz and eoa tx testing

geth is still having some EIP-7778 gas accounting issues
nimbus-el still activates EIP-8024 too early fulu
reth is missing blocks for both eoa and evm-fuzz tests

It would be great to have one more stable client under eoa and evm-fuzzing tests before launching devnet-2. <@427903869226582018>  <@902806914252021830>  <@880461889509941258>

author: jwasinger
content: I've pushed a fix for 7778 and Geth now interops with Besu before and after the fork when I've tested it locally with Kurtosis

author: jwasinger
content: I am still working on integrating "batch io" (parallelizing loading of read storage slots and accounts with tx execution and state root calculation)
